018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg;
019
020import static java.lang.String.join;
021import static java.util.stream.Collectors.joining;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_ClipPathUnits;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_LengthAdjust;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerHeight;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerUnits;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerWidth;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_Orientation;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_PathDefinition;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_Position;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_ReferenceX;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_ReferenceY;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_Rotate;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_TextLength;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_dx;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_dy;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_x;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_x1;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_x2;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_y;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_y1;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.SVGATTRIBUTE_y2;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.SVGUtils.number;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
048import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.stream;
049
050import java.util.ArrayList;
051import java.util.Arrays;
052import java.util.List;
053import java.util.Optional;
054
055import org.apiguardian.api.API;
056import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
057import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.MountPoint;
058import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.internal.SVGElementImpl;
059import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGMarkerOrientation;
060import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber;
061import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGDegree;
062import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGPathElement;
063
064/**
065 *  This is the base class for a custom type that wants to extend an SVG
066 *  element with additional features. <br>
067 *  <br>Basically, an implementation may look like this (in this example, for
068 *  an SVG {@code <symbol>} extension:<pre><code>  &hellip;
069 *  public class MySymbol extends SVGElementBase
070 *  {
071 *      &hellip;
072 *      public MySymbol()
073 *      {
074 *          super( SVGUtils.SVGELEMENT_Symbol, ALLOW_CHILDREN );
075 *          &hellip;
076 *      }
077 *      &hellip;
078 *  }</code></pre>
079 *
080 *  @note   Such a custom element implements all the other interfaces; it is
081 *      all the other element type <i>at the same type</i>! But that does not
082 *      mean that it will inherit their features automatically! Especially it
083 *      will not validate children or attributes!
084 *
085 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
086 *  @version $Id: SVGElementAdapter.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $
087 *  @since 0.0.5
088 *
089 *  @UMLGraph.link
090 */
091@SuppressWarnings( {"AbstractClassExtendsConcreteClass", "ClassWithTooManyMethods", "OverlyCoupledClass"} )
092@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGElementAdapter.java 840 2021-01-10 21:37:03Z tquadrat $" )
093@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
094public abstract non-sealed class SVGElementAdapter extends SVGElementImpl
095    implements AllowsDocumentElementEventAttributes, AllowsDocumentEventAttributes, SVGClipPath, SVGGroup, SVGLine, SVGPath, SVGPositionedMarker, SVGRectangle, SVGStyle, SVGSymbol, SVGText, SVGTSpan, SVGUse
096{
097        /*------------*\
098    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
099        \*------------*/
100    /**
101     *  The lines of the CSS style definitions.
102     */
103    private final List<String> m_StyleDefinitions = new ArrayList<>();
104
105        /*--------------*\
106    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
107        \*--------------*/
108    /**
109     *  Creates a new {@code SVGElementAdapter} instance.
110     *
111     *  @param  elementName The name of the element.
112     *  @param  flags   The flags that determine the behaviour of the new
113     *      element.
114     */
115    protected SVGElementAdapter( final String elementName, final Flags... flags )
116    {
117        super( elementName, flags );
118    }   //  SVGElementAdapter()
119
120        /*---------*\
121    ====** Methods **==========================================================
122        \*---------*/
123    /**
124     *  {@inheritDoc}
125     */
126    @MountPoint
127    @Override
128    public void addStyle( final CharSequence... styles )
129    {
130        for( final var style : requireNonNullArgument( styles, "styles" ) )
131        {
132            if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( style ) )
133            {
134                stream( style, '\n' ).forEach( m_StyleDefinitions::add );
135            }
136            else
137            {
138                m_StyleDefinitions.add( EMPTY_STRING );
139            }
140        }
141    }   //  addStyle()
142
143    /**
144     *  {@inheritDoc}
145     */
146    @MountPoint
147    @Override
148    public void defineLine( final SVGNumber x1, final SVGNumber y1, final SVGNumber x2, final SVGNumber y2 )
149    {
150        setStartPoint( x1, y1 );
151        setEndPoint( x2, y2 );
152    }   //  defineLine()
153
154    /**
155     *  {@inheritDoc}
156     */
157    @MountPoint
158    @Override
159    public void setPathLength( final double length )
160    {
161        setPathLength( number( length ) );
162    }   //  setPathLength()
163
164    /**
165     *  {@inheritDoc}
166     */
167    @MountPoint
168    @Override
169    public void setPathLength( final long length )
170    {
171        setPathLength( number( length ) );
172    }   //  setPathLength()
173
174    /**
175     *  {@inheritDoc}
176     */
177    @MountPoint
178    @Override
179    public String getStyleSheet()
180    {
181        final var retValue = join( "\n", m_StyleDefinitions );
182
183        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
184        return retValue;
185    }   //  getStyleSheet()
186
187    /**
188     *  {@inheritDoc}
189     */
190    @MountPoint
191    @Override
192    public void merge( final SVGStyle other )
193    {
194        addStyle( other.getStyleSheet() );
195    }   //  merge()
196
197    /**
198     *  {@inheritDoc}
199     */
200    @MountPoint
201    @Override
202    public void setClipPathUnits( final boolean flag )
203    {
204        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_ClipPathUnits, flag ? "objectBoundingBox" : "userSpaceOnUse" );
205    }   //  setClipPathUnits()
206
207    /**
208     *  {@inheritDoc}
209     */
210    @MountPoint
211    @Override
212    public void setDx( final SVGNumber... values )
213    {
214        final var value = nonNull( values ) && (values.length != 0)
215            ? Arrays.stream( values )
216                .map( SVGNumber::toString )
217                .collect( joining( "," ) )
218            : null;
219        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_dx, value );
220    }   //  setDx()
221
222    /**
223     *  {@inheritDoc}
224     */
225    @MountPoint
226    @Override
227    public void setDy( final SVGNumber... values )
228    {
229        final var value = nonNull( values ) && (values.length != 0)
230            ? Arrays.stream( values )
231                .map( SVGNumber::toString )
232                .collect( joining( "," ) )
233            : null;
234        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_dy, value );
235    }   //  setDy()
236
237    /**
238     *  {@inheritDoc}
239     */
240    @MountPoint
241    @Override
242    public void setLengthAdjust( final boolean flag )
243    {
244        final var value = flag ? "spacingAndGlyphs" : "spacing";
245        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_LengthAdjust, value );
246    }   //  setLengthAdjust()
247
248    /**
249     *  {@inheritDoc}
250     */
251    @MountPoint
252    @Override
253    public void setMarkerHeight( final SVGNumber value )
254    {
255        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerHeight, value );
256    }   //  setMarkerHeight()
257
258    /**
259     *  {@inheritDoc}
260     */
261    @MountPoint
262    @Override
263    public void setMarkerUnits( final boolean flag )
264    {
265        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerUnits, flag ? "userSpaceOnUse" : "strokeWidth" );
266    }   //  setMarkerUnits()
267
268    /**
269     *  {@inheritDoc}
270     */
271    @MountPoint
272    @Override
273    public void setMarkerWidth( final SVGNumber value )
274    {
275        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_MarkerWidth, value );
276    }   //  setMarkerWidth()
277
278    /**
279     *  {@inheritDoc}
280     */
281    @MountPoint
282    @Override
283    public void setOrientation( final SVGMarkerOrientation value )
284    {
285        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_Orientation, nonNull( value ) ? value.toString() : null );
286    }   //  setOrientation()
287
288    /**
289     *  {@inheritDoc}
290     */
291    @MountPoint
292    @Override
293    public void setOrientation( final SVGNumber.SVGDegree value )
294    {
295        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_Orientation, nonNull( value ) ? value.toString() : null );
296    }   //  setOrientation()
297
298    /**
299     *  {@inheritDoc}
300     */
301    @MountPoint
302    @Override
303    public void setPathDefinition( final SVGPathElement... pathElements )
304    {
305        final var value = nonNull( pathElements ) ? SVGPathElement.toString( pathElements ) : null;
306        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_PathDefinition, value, Optional.of( " " ) );
307    }   //  setPathDefinition()
308
309    /**
310     *  {@inheritDoc}
311     */
312    @MountPoint
313    @Override
314    public void setPosition( final SVGNumber value )
315    {
316        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_Position, value );
317    }   //  setPosition()
318
319    /**
320     *  {@inheritDoc}
321     */
322    @MountPoint
323    @Override
324    public void setReferenceX( final SVGNumber value )
325    {
326        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_ReferenceX, value );
327    }   //  setReferenceX()
328
329    /**
330     *  {@inheritDoc}
331     */
332    @MountPoint
333    @Override
334    public void setReferenceY( final SVGNumber value )
335    {
336        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_ReferenceY, value );
337    }   //  setReferenceY()
338
339    /**
340     *  {@inheritDoc}
341     */
342    @MountPoint
343    @Override
344    public void setRotate( final SVGNumber.SVGDegree... values )
345    {
346        final var value = nonNull( values ) && (values.length != 0)
347            ? Arrays.stream( values )
348                .map( SVGDegree::toString )
349                .collect( joining( "," ) )
350            : null;
351        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_Rotate, value );
352    }   //  setRotate()
353
354    /**
355     *  {@inheritDoc}
356     */
357    @MountPoint
358    @Override
359    public void setTextLength( final SVGNumber value )
360    {
361        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_TextLength, value );
362    }   //  setTextLength()
363
364    /**
365     *  {@inheritDoc}
366     */
367    @MountPoint
368    @Override
369    public void setX( final SVGNumber... values )
370    {
371        final var value = nonNull( values ) && (values.length != 0)
372            ? Arrays.stream( values )
373                .map( SVGNumber::toString )
374                .collect( joining( "," ) )
375            : null;
376        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_x, value );
377    }   //  setX()
378
379    /**
380     *  {@inheritDoc}
381     */
382    @MountPoint
383    @Override
384    public void setX1( final SVGNumber value )
385    {
386        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_x1, value );
387    }   //  setX1()
388
389    /**
390     *  {@inheritDoc}
391     */
392    @MountPoint
393    @Override
394    public void setX2( final SVGNumber value )
395    {
396        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_x2, value );
397    }   //  setX2()
398
399    /**
400     *  {@inheritDoc}
401     */
402    @MountPoint
403    @Override
404    public void setY( final SVGNumber... values )
405    {
406        final var value = nonNull( values ) && (values.length != 0)
407            ? Arrays.stream( values )
408                .map( SVGNumber::toString )
409                .collect( joining( "," ) )
410            : null;
411        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_y, value );
412    }   //  setY()
413
414    /**
415     *  {@inheritDoc}
416     */
417    @MountPoint
418    @Override
419    public void setY1( final SVGNumber value )
420    {
421        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_y1, value );
422    }   //  setY1()
423
424    /**
425     *  {@inheritDoc}
426     */
427    @MountPoint
428    @Override
429    public void setY2( final SVGNumber value )
430    {
431        setAttribute( SVGATTRIBUTE_y2, value );
432    }   //  setY2()
433
434    /**
435     *  {@inheritDoc}
436     */
437    @MountPoint
438    @Override
439    public String toString( final int indentationLevel, final boolean prettyPrint )
440    {
441        return super.toString( indentationLevel, prettyPrint );
442    }   //  toString()
443}
444//  class SVGElementAdapter
445
